segments.source_content: # Docs Introduction

translations.zh-hant: # 文件介紹

segments.source_content: The docs feature provides users with a way to organize Markdown files in a hierarchical format.

translations.zh-hant: 文件功能提供使用者以階層結構組織 Markdown 檔案的方式。

segments.source_content:
:::info

Check the [Docs Plugin API Reference documentation](./../../api/plugins/plugin-content-docs.mdx) for an exhaustive list of options.

:::

translations.zh-hant:
:::info

詳盡選項清單請參閱[文件插件 API 參考文檔](./../../api/plugins/plugin-content-docs.mdx)。

:::

segments.source_content: Your site's documentation is organized by four levels, from lowest to highest:

translations.zh-hant: 您網站的文檔組織分為四個層級，由低至高分別為：

segments.source_content:
1. Individual pages.
2. Sidebars.
3. Versions.
4. Plugin instances.

translations.zh-hant:
1. 個別頁面
2. 側邊欄
3. 版本
4. 插件實例

segments.source_content: The guide will introduce them in that order: starting from [how individual pages can be configured](./docs-create-doc.mdx), to [how to create a sidebar or multiple ones](./sidebar/index.mdx), to [how to create and manage versions](./versioning.mdx), to [how to use multiple docs plugin instances](./docs-multi-instance.mdx).

translations.zh-hant: 本指南將依序介紹：從[如何配置個別頁面](./docs-create-doc.mdx)開始，到[如何建立單一或多個側邊欄](./sidebar/index.mdx)，再到[如何建立與管理版本](./versioning.mdx)，最後是[如何使用多個文件插件實例](./docs-multi-instance.mdx)。

segments.source_content: ## Docs-only mode {#docs-only-mode}

translations.zh-hant: ## 純文件模式 {#docs-only-mode}

segments.source_content: A freshly initialized Docusaurus site has the following structure:

translations.zh-hant: 新初始化的 Docusaurus 站點具有以下結構：

segments.source_content:
```
example.com/                                -> generated from `src/pages/index.js`

example.com/docs/intro                      -> generated from `docs/intro.md`
example.com/docs/tutorial-basics/...        -> generated from `docs/tutorial-basics/...`
...

example.com/blog/2021/08/26/welcome         -> generated from `blog/2021-08-26-welcome/index.md`
example.com/blog/2021/08/01/mdx-blog-post   -> generated from `blog/2021-08-01-mdx-blog-post.mdx`
...
```

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_b7c3dbd1

segments.source_content: All docs will be served under the subroute `docs/`. But what if **your site only has docs**, or you want to prioritize your docs by putting them at the root?

translations.zh-hant: 所有文件將透過子路由 `docs/` 提供。但若**您的站點僅包含文件**，或希望將文件置於根目錄以提升優先級該如何處理？

segments.source_content: Assume that you have the following in your configuration:

translations.zh-hant: 假設您的配置中包含以下內容：
@@untranslatable_placeholder_4ec2920d

segments.source_content: To enter docs-only mode, change it to like this:

translations.zh-hant: 要啟用純文件模式，請修改為如下形式：
@@untranslatable_placeholder_67b24fc5

segments.source_content: Note that you **don't necessarily have to give up on using the blog** or other plugins; all that `routeBasePath: '/'` does is that instead of serving the docs through `https://example.com/docs/some-doc`, they are now at the site root: `https://example.com/some-doc`. The blog, if enabled, can still be accessed through the `blog/` subroute.

translations.zh-hant: 請注意，您**不一定需要放棄使用部落格**或其他插件；`routeBasePath: '/'` 的作用僅是將文件服務路徑從 `https://example.com/docs/some-doc` 變更為站點根目錄：`https://example.com/some-doc`。若啟用部落格，仍可透過 `blog/` 子路由存取。

segments.source_content: Don't forget to put some page at the root (`https://example.com/`) through adding the front matter:

translations.zh-hant: 別忘了透過添加前置元數據在根目錄 (`https://example.com/`) 放置頁面：

segments.source_content:
```md title="docs/intro.md"
---
# highlight-next-line
slug: /
---

This page will be the home page when users visit https://example.com/.
```

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_5782e280

segments.source_content:
:::warning

If you added `slug: /` to a doc to make it the homepage, you should delete the existing homepage at `./src/pages/index.js`, or else there will be two files mapping to the same route!

:::

translations.zh-hant:
:::warning

若您已為某文件添加 `slug: /` 使其成為首頁，應刪除現有位於 `./src/pages/index.js` 的首頁，否則將有兩個檔案映射至相同路由！

:::

segments.source_content: Now, the site's structure will be like the following:

translations.zh-hant: 現在，站點結構將如下所示：

segments.source_content:
```
example.com/                       -> generated from `docs/intro.md`
example.com/tutorial-basics/...    -> generated from `docs/tutorial-basics/...`
...
```

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_7ded566f

segments.source_content:
:::tip

There's also a "blog-only mode" for those who only want to use the blog feature of Docusaurus. You can use the same method detailed above. Follow the setup instructions on [Blog-only mode](../../blog.mdx#blog-only-mode).

:::

translations.zh-hant:
:::tip

對於僅需使用 Docusaurus 部落格功能的用戶，亦有「純部落格模式」可供選擇。您可採用上述相同方法，參照[純部落格模式](../../blog.mdx#blog-only-mode)的設定說明進行操作。

:::
